about.description: Born in Rio de Janeiro and currently living in Niter√≥i. A 20-year-old technology professional with a strong interest in software development, especially using Python and focused on data analysis. I've participated in projects involving games and websites, always seeking to combine speed and quality. I'm a quick learner, adaptable to different contexts, and enjoy working in teams, contributing with responsibility and dedication to achieve good results.
